title: White ICE Xdr-8001 Vertical in Ear Ultralight Sport Running Headband Headphones (mdr-w08l Style White and Silver)
description: Great quality sound with the most comfortable time tested design by cutting edge electronics company SONXTRONIC. Similar vertical design to the sony mdr-w08 and sony mdr-w08L the SONXTRONIC XDR-8000 is a must have for active women and men wanting extended comfort in an attractive, simple, ultralight weight stay in place design with great looks and true quality sound for an ultralight sport headphone. Doesn't fall out like earbuds. Doesn't move like behind the ear headphones. Earpiece shape designed to be the most comfortable for extended wear currently available.
